articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
Republican congressmen call out Gary Gensler and request documents surrounding the SEC's interactions with SBF and FTX...

Rep. Bill Huizenga: Since @garygensler won't abide by his own polices to "come in and talk”, the House GOP will hold him accountable. Today, as promised, our oversight of the @SECGov begins with a request for documents surrounding their interactions with @SBF_FTX, @FTX_Official, and @TheJusticeDept
articles.title: Republican congressmen call out Gary Gensler and request documents surrounding the SEC's interactions with SBF and FTX...

articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
Coinbase CEO hearing rumors the SEC would like to get rid of staking for retail customers…

Brian Armstrong: 1/ We're hearing rumors that the SEC would like to get rid of crypto staking in the U.S. for retail customers. I hope that's not the case as I believe it would be a terrible path for the U.S. if that was allowed to happen.
articles.title: Coinbase CEO hearing rumors the SEC would like to get rid of staking for retail customers…

articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
.@SenatorHagerty defends crypto, decries using banking regulators to advance political agendas...

Senator Bill Hagerty: Regulators singling out business activities should alarm all Americans. 
It doesn’t matter if it’s cryptoassets, firearms, or any other lawful business, using banking regulators to advance political agendas should not be tolerated.
 https://blockworks.co/news/crypto-poses-key-risks-to-banks-but-carry-on
articles.title: .@SenatorHagerty defends crypto, decries using banking regulators to advance political agendas...
